channel.title: Comments on: Hong Kong Trip: Part 2 – The Food

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Yeah I've heard that as well. And while go may be popular in certain areas, it seems that Chinese chess is more commonly seen as opposed to go even though you're in Asia. Might be different in Korea though. Haha.
item.content:encoded: Yeah I’ve heard that as well. And while go may be popular in certain areas, it seems that Chinese chess is more commonly seen as opposed to go even though you’re in Asia. Might be different in Korea though. Haha.

item.title: By: Hong Kong Trip: Part 3 - Weiqi | BenGoZen
item.dc:creator: Hong Kong Trip: Part 3 - Weiqi | BenGoZen

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. It was certainly a delicious adventure for sure. Definitely let me know if you go to Hong Kong and I'll be sure to let you know where we went!
item.content:encoded: Haha. It was certainly a delicious adventure for sure. Definitely let me know if you go to Hong Kong and I’ll be sure to let you know where we went!

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description: Unfortunately not. Go wasn't really that high of a priority on that trip, and with my nonexistent Chinese language skills it would have been very difficult to do anything related to that. It also seemed like it was not part of the culture there. I saw plenty of people playing Chinese chess, but never once a go board.
item.content:encoded: Unfortunately not. Go wasn’t really that high of a priority on that trip, and with my nonexistent Chinese language skills it would have been very difficult to do anything related to that. It also seemed like it was not part of the culture there. I saw plenty of people playing Chinese chess, but never once a go board.

item.title: By: Xezlec
item.dc:creator: Xezlec
item.description: Oh my GOD.... I envy you so hard...
item.content:encoded: Oh my GOD…. I envy you so hard…

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hey Todd! Long time no talk! I also stick to vegetarian food most of the time, but as you can see I just had to make an exception this trip. There were just too many opportunities I couldn't pass up! Haha. Hope you're doing well!
item.content:encoded: Hey Todd! Long time no talk! I also stick to vegetarian food most of the time, but as you can see I just had to make an exception this trip. There were just too many opportunities I couldn’t pass up! Haha. Hope you’re doing well!

item.title: By: Todd Bowlby
item.dc:creator: Todd Bowlby
item.description: I am soooo hungry now. I try to stick to vegetarian food, but I'd have to be off my diet if I got a shot at some of that sashimi. Or even some of that good looking ramen! Or pretty much anything you took a picture of...:)
item.content:encoded: I am soooo hungry now. I try to stick to vegetarian food, but I’d have to be off my diet if I got a shot at some of that sashimi. Or even some of that good looking ramen! Or pretty much anything you took a picture of…:)

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Oh nice! My Chinese teacher lives in Xi'an. Haha. But that is totally what I would prefer when traveling. It's definitely great to have someone who lives in the area. Did you get to do any go related activities when you went to visit her?
item.content:encoded: Oh nice! My Chinese teacher lives in Xi’an. Haha. But that is totally what I would prefer when traveling. It’s definitely great to have someone who lives in the area. Did you get to do any go related activities when you went to visit her?

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description: Yeah, fortunately my sister has been living in Xi'an for quite a while before we visited there. So we knew all the cool places to eat.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, fortunately my sister has been living in Xi’an for quite a while before we visited there. So we knew all the cool places to eat.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I love hole in the wall type places though! Those are sometimes the best places you can go. It's just that you usually need someone to recommend it in order to know where to go, otherwise the risk of food poisoning is just way too high. Hahahaha. It was a lot of fun! Definitely should visit sometime!
item.content:encoded:
I love hole in the wall type places though! Those are sometimes the best places you can go. It’s just that you usually need someone to recommend it in order to know where to go, otherwise the risk of food poisoning is just way too high. Hahahaha.
It was a lot of fun! Definitely should visit sometime!
